head.eyes: Warm, compassionate maroon eyes that shift to sharp focus during combat. Eyes contain the kindness of his family and determination of his mission. Pupils can become slitted when tapping into demonic memories or intense concentration
head.nose: Exceptionally sensitive nose that can detect emotions, demons, and minute environmental changes. Can smell sadness, lies, and even history of locations. Slightly rounded tip that gives gentle appearance
head.ears: Normal ears adorned with distinctive hanafuda earrings passed through generations. Can hear heartbeats and subtle movements. Earrings jingle softly during movement, becoming a recognizable sound to allies
head.extra_facial_features: Gentle face with kind features that belie his warrior spirit. Prominent scar on forehead that changes form when using Sun Breathing techniques. Black hair with red tips that glow during intense battles. Hair usually tied in ponytail. Expression usually kind but becomes fiercely protective when fighting demons

body.chest: Lean, athletic build developed through brutal training. Chest (40 inches) shows definition without bulk, optimized for breathing techniques. Scar from initial demon attack visible on shoulder. Skin bears numerous training scars from Urokodaki's harsh methods. Breathing causes visible steam during techniques
body.arms: Strong arms with defined muscles from constant sword practice. Biceps (14 inches) show perfect sword-swinging development. Forearms are crisscrossed with scars from battles. Hands are calloused but gentle when caring for Nezuko. Grip strength exceptional for sword control

lower_body.legs: Powerful legs built for the Total Concentration Constant. Thighs (21 inches) show explosive power for Water Breathing techniques. Calves are perfectly toned from mountain running. Can maintain incredible speed and agility for extended periods

armor_costume.head: No helmet, allowing maximum sensory perception. Checkered haori hood can be pulled up in rain or snow. Hanafuda earrings constantly worn. Hair tied back to keep vision clear

armor_costume.torso: Standard Demon Slayer Corps uniform: black gakuran jacket with bronze buttons. Green and black checkered haori over top, pattern matching his sister's kimono. Uniform reinforced with special fibers that resist demon claws

armor_costume.arms: No gauntlets, allowing free movement for sword techniques. Uniform sleeves allow complete range of motion. Hands protected by fingerless gloves when needed

armor_costume.legs: Black hakama pants with reinforced knees. Leg wrappings for additional protection. Special tabi boots with split-toe design for better grip and stealth movement

armor_costume.equipment: Nichirin sword that changes color to black with red edge. Wooden box for carrying Nezuko during daytime. Medical supplies and demon-slaying tools. Wisteria poison for emergency use

abilities.name: Water Breathing
abilities.short_description: Sword techniques that mimic the flow and power of water
abilities.full_description: First breathing style learned, with 10 forms focusing on fluid movement and precise strikes. Creates visual effects of flowing water during attacks. Techniques range from defensive (Water Wheel) to offensive (Striking Tide). Forms can be modified and combined. Mastery allows cutting through anything with water-like persistence

abilities.name: Sun Breathing
abilities.short_description: Original breathing style from which all others derive, mimicking the sun
abilities.full_description: Most powerful breathing style with 13 forms. Creates solar flame visual effects. Can actually burn demons like sunlight. Passed down through family dance. Each form corresponds to different solar phenomena. When mastered, sword glows bright red and leaves burning trails. Can be combined with Water Breathing for unique techniques

head.eyes: Large, expressive pink eyes that change from gentle to fierce. Pupils become slitted when in combat mode. Eyes convey childlike innocence despite demon nature. Can communicate emotions through eye movements alone
head.nose: Normal human nose that retains some sensitivity. Often wrinkled when smelling danger. Bamboo muzzle covers lower face, secured by red cord
head.ears: Normal ears partially hidden by long black hair. Can hear subtle sounds even in sleep. Hair ornaments (now gone) replaced by natural hair color gradient
head.extra_facial_features: Pale demon skin that glows in moonlight. Black hair fading to orange-red at tips. Hair grows when using powers. Small fangs visible when mouth opens. Bamboo muzzle prevents biting. Childlike face that belies growing power

body.chest: Petite frame that shrinks to child size to conserve energy. Chest (32 inches) shows no definition due to child form. Demon markings appear on skin when using powers. Skin is pale but warm to touch for allies
body.arms: Slender arms with hidden strength. Biceps (9 inches) can expand with demon power. Hands have sharp black nails that can extend into claws. Wears simple kimono sleeves

lower_body.legs: Short legs in child form, normal length when grown. Thighs (16 inches) contain explosive power for kicking. Can regenerate limbs instantly. Often barefoot or wearing simple sandals

armor_costume.head: Bambose muzzle secured with red cord. No other headwear. Hair worn loose or in simple style. Former hair ornament replaced by natural color

armor_costume.torso: Pink kimono with black patterns, originally her mother's. Red obi sash. Simple undergarments. Kimono sleeves allow free movement

armor_costume.arms: No armor or protection. Kimono sleeves cover arms. Hands usually kept at sides unless fighting

armor_costume.legs: Kimono skirt allows kicking freedom. No leg armor. Often barefoot or wearing simple footwear when provided

armor_costume.equipment: Wooden box for daytime travel. No weapons besides natural demon abilities. Sometimes carries small pouch given by brother

abilities.name: Blood Demon Art: Exploding Blood
abilities.short_description: Manipulates own blood to create explosive or protective effects
abilities.full_description: Primary Blood Demon Art. Can ignite blood to create explosions or form protective barriers. Pink flames are harmless to humans but destructive to demons. Can create concentrated bursts or wide-area explosions. Grows more powerful with emotional triggers

abilities.name: Size Manipulation
abilities.short_description: Can shrink to child size or grow to adult form
abilities.full_description: Unique ability to conserve energy by shrinking body. Child form uses less energy and maintains human cognition. Adult form increases physical power dramatically. Transformation triggered by combat needs or emotional states

abilities.name: Daytime Resistance
abilities.short_description: Can survive sunlight exposure without disintegrating
abilities.full_description: Unique among demons. Can walk in sunlight without burning. Possibly due to human willpower or unique transformation. Sunlight still weakens but doesn't destroy. Requires more energy when in sunlight

head.eyes: Large, expressive golden-brown eyes that often tear up. Pupils shrink to dots when terrified. In sleep, eyes remain closed but senses active. Can see lightning trails even with eyes closed
head.nose: Normal nose, very sensitive to demon scents. Wrinkles when crying or scared. Can sniff out danger before seeing it
head.ears: Exceptional hearing that detects heartbeats, emotions, and minute movements. Ears twitch when detecting lies or danger. Normal appearance but function supernaturally
head.extra_facial_features: Boyish face with permanent anxious expression. Peach-colored hair with yellow gradient at tips. Hair spikes when using Thunder Breathing. Often has tear stains on cheeks. Mouth either trembling or determined line

body.chest: Slender build that hides explosive power. Chest (38 inches) expands dramatically when using breathing techniques. Wears standard uniform under yellow haori. Skin bears light scars from training
body.arms: Deceptively strong arms from constant sword practice. Biceps (13 inches) contain lightning-fast reflexes. Hands tremble when scared but steady in sleep. Calloused from gripping sword

lower_body.legs: Legs built for incredible speed. Thighs (20 inches) contain power for Thunder Breathing First Form. Calves perfectly developed for instant acceleration. Can move faster than eye can follow

armor_costume.head: No helmet. Hair often messy from running. Sometimes wears simple headband. Ears always exposed for maximum hearing

armor_costume.torso: Standard Demon Slayer uniform. Distinctive yellow haori with white triangle pattern. Haori represents lightning. Uniform often disheveled from panic

armor_costume.arms: No gauntlets. Uniform sleeves rolled up sometimes. Wears fingerless gloves for better grip

armor_costume.legs: Standard hakama pants. Leg wrappings for support. Special tabi boots reinforced for high-speed movement

armor_costume.equipment: Nichirin sword that turns yellow with lightning patterns. Standard demon-slaying kit. Extra thunderclap bombs. Always carries debt collection notices

abilities.name: Thunder Breathing: First Form - Thunderclap and Flash
abilities.short_description: Extremely fast forward dash and slash
abilities.full_description: Mastered single form of Thunder Breathing. Moves at lightning speed leaving golden trail. Can be used in sixfold or eightfold variations for multiple strikes. Speed increases when unconscious. Creates actual thunderclap sound. Cuts before demon can react

abilities.name: Enhanced Hearing
abilities.full_description: Can hear heartbeats, emotions, muscle movements, and even spiritual presence. Detects lies and intentions. Can pinpoint weaknesses in enemy stance. Hearing so acute it causes pain in loud environments

abilities.name: Sleep Fighting
abilities.short_description: Fights at full power while unconscious
abilities.full_description: When terrified, falls asleep and fights instinctively. Eliminates hesitation and fear. Techniques become more refined. Can access full potential without mental blocks. Wakes up unaware of actions

head.eyes: Sharp, fierce emerald green eyes visible through boar mask. Pupils contract to predatory slits when excited. Eyes glow with fighting spirit. Can see in near-darkness from mountain living
head.nose: Exceptionally sensitive nose, nearly equal to Tanjiro's. Can track by scent alone. Often sniffs loudly when curious. Nose wrinkles when angry or confused
head.ears: Normal ears hidden by wild hair. Can hear subtle sounds from wilderness training. Ears perk up at challenge or food mention
head.extra_facial_features: Surprisingly beautiful feminine face that contrasts wild personality. Pale skin with delicate features. Blue-black hair worn wild and untamed. Often wears boar head mask. Mouth either in fierce grin or pout

body.chest: Extremely muscular and defined torso. Chest (44 inches) shows perfect muscle development. Covered in scars from mountain fights. Skin pale from lack of sun exposure. Abs clearly defined even at rest
body.arms: Massively powerful arms from wilderness survival. Biceps (16 inches) bulge with raw power. Shoulders broad and heavily muscled. Hands calloused and scarred. Can grip with crushing force

lower_body.legs: Powerful legs built for leaping and climbing. Thighs (24 inches) like tree trunks. Calves perfectly developed for mountain terrain. Can run on all fours at incredible speed

armor_costume.head: Boar head mask made from actual boar head. Worn constantly except when eating or sleeping. Mask has fierce expression. His own face rarely seen by others

armor_costume.torso: No shirt, exposing muscular torso. Wears fur pelt over shoulders. Later adds standard uniform pants but often leaves chest bare. Tribal markings sometimes painted on skin

armor_costume.arms: No armor. Arms completely exposed. Wrist wrappings for grip. Often has fresh scratches or wounds

armor_costume.legs: Standard hakama pants but often torn or modified. Leg wrappings for climbing. Barefoot or simple foot coverings

armor_costume.equipment: Two notched Nichirin swords with serrated edges. Crude self-made sheaths. Often carries foraged food. Minimal demon-slaying supplies

abilities.name: Beast Breathing
abilities.short_description: Self-developed breathing style mimicking wild beasts
abilities.full_description: Unique breathing style with 10 fang techniques. Focuses on unpredictable, wild movements. Dual-wielding creates whirlwind of attacks. Can sense openings like animal sensing weakness. Techniques named after beast fangs and claws

abilities.name: Spatial Awareness
abilities.short_description: Can sense space and objects without sight
abilities.full_description: Developed in pitch-dark mountains. Can sense surroundings through air currents, vibrations, and instinct. Can fight blindfolded. Detects invisible attacks. Spatial memory is perfect

abilities.name: Flexible Joints
abilities.short_description: Can contort body in unnatural ways
abilities.full_description: Joints can dislocate and reposition at will. Can squeeze through impossibly small spaces. Attacks come from unexpected angles. Makes defense against him nearly impossible

characters.name: Giyu Tomioka
title: Water Hashira of Demon Slayer Corps
Former Tsuguko of Urokodaki
Tanjiro's Sponsor

head.eyes: Deep blue, perpetually serious eyes. Expression rarely changes. Eyes show focus and melancholy. Can see water flow in movements. Pupils sharpen during combat
head.nose: Straight, aristocratic nose. Normal sensitivity. Often wrinkles slightly at strong odors
head.ears: Normal ears partially covered by hair. Can hear subtle sounds. Often ignores conversational noise
head.extra_facial_features: Handsome but stern face. Black hair with uneven cut. Left side longer, right side shorter. Wears hair loose. Permanent serious expression. Rarely smiles

body.chest: Lean, athletic build. Chest (41 inches) shows perfect swordsman physique. No unnecessary bulk. Skin bears Hashira-level scars. Always maintains perfect posture
body.arms: Long, powerful arms for Water Breathing. Biceps (14.5 inches) perfectly developed. Forearms show defined muscles. Hands have sword callouses. Grip is precise and strong

lower_body.legs: Strong legs built for fluid movement. Thighs (22 inches) powerful but lean. Calves developed for quick directional changes. Always balanced perfectly

armor_costume.head: No helmet. Hair worn loose. Sometimes wears standard Corps headband. Forehead usually exposed

armor_costume.torso: Standard Hashira uniform with haori. Two-toned haori: right side red, left side green-checkered pattern. Uniform perfectly maintained. No unnecessary accessories

armor_costume.arms: Standard uniform sleeves. No additional armor. Wears fingerless gloves sometimes

armor_costume.legs: Standard hakama pants. Leg wrappings for support. Tabi boots for silent movement

armor_costume.equipment: Standard Nichirin sword that turns deep blue. Standard demon-slaying kit. Always carries Corps regulations. Minimal personal items

abilities.name: Water Breathing: All Forms
abilities.short_description: Master of all Water Breathing techniques
abilities.full_description: Has mastered all 10 standard forms plus created Eleventh Form. Techniques create massive water dragon effects. Can shift between forms seamlessly. Water effects are clearer and larger than other users

abilities.name: Dead Calm (Eleventh Form)
abilities.full_description: Personal creation, not taught. Enters state of complete calm. Can nullify all incoming attacks within range. Creates zone of perfect defense. Requires immense concentration

abilities.name: Hashira-Level Strength
abilities.full_description: All physical attributes at maximum human potential. Speed, strength, endurance, reflexes all elite. Can fight Upper Moons evenly. Recovery rate exceptional

characters.name: Shinobu Kocho
title: Insect Hashira of Demon Slayer Corps
Butterfly Estate Master
Corps Medical Chief

head.eyes: Large, gentle purple eyes that always smile. Eyes hide deep pain and anger. Pupils remain soft even in combat. Can see minute details like insect movements
head.nose: Delicate nose with normal sensitivity. Often wrinkles when smelling poison or medicine
head.ears: Small, delicate ears usually hidden by hair. Can hear whispers and subtle sounds
head.extra_facial_features: Beautiful, doll-like face with permanent gentle smile. Dark purple hair with gradient to lighter purple. Hair styled in side ponytail. Butterfly hairpin. Always smiling, never shows true anger

body.chest: Small, delicate frame that hides strength. Chest (34 inches) appears fragile. Actually highly trained but lacks brute force. Skin pale from indoor work. Always perfect posture
body.arms: Slender arms designed for precision. Biceps (10 inches) contain surprising strength. Hands delicate but steady for medical work. Can perform precise strikes

lower_body.legs: Slender legs built for agility. Thighs (18 inches) allow quick movements. Calves developed for insect-like footwork. Always moves gracefully

armor_costume.head: Butterfly hairpin on right side. Hair in side ponytail. No helmet. Always looks perfectly groomed

armor_costume.torso: Standard Hashira uniform modified. White haori with butterfly wing pattern. Uniform includes corset-like top. Colors: white and purple theme

armor_costume.arms: Standard sleeves. No armor. Hands often gloved for medical work

armor_costume.legs: Modified hakama skirt for freedom. Leggings underneath. Tabi boots for silent movement

armor_costume.equipment: Unique thin Nichirin sword designed for stabbing. Sword contains poison channels. Carries multiple poison vials. Medical kit always on hand. Butterfly message system

abilities.name: Insect Breathing
abilities.full_description: Created due to lack of strength for decapitation. Focuses on poison delivery through stabbing. Techniques mimic insect movements. Four main forms plus variations. Paralyzes demons with wisteria poison

abilities.name: Medical Expertise
abilities.full_description: Heads Corps medical operations. Created anti-demon poisons and medicines. Can perform complex surgeries. Understands demon biology completely. Developed healing regimens for slayers

abilities.name: Poison Mastery
abilities.full_description: Sword injects concentrated wisteria poison. Can adjust dosage for paralysis or death. Developed poison lethal only to demons. Carries multiple poison types for different situations

characters.name: Kyojuro Rengoku
title: Flame Hashira of Demon Slayer Corps
Rengoku Family Head
Master of Flame Breathing

head.eyes: Large, bright gold eyes with red pupils. Eyes burn with passion and determination. Eyebrows and eyelashes flame-shaped. Expression always enthusiastic
head.nose: Strong, straight nose. Normal sensitivity. Often flares when excited
head.ears: Normal ears. Can hear well but often ignores negative comments
head.extra_facial_features: Handsome face with permanent enthusiastic expression. Bright yellow hair with red tips like flames. Hair styled upward. Bushy eyebrows. Always smiling widely

body.chest: Powerful, broad chest. Chest (46 inches) shows immense strength. Perfect Hashira physique. Skin bears few scars due to skill. Always seems larger than life
body.arms: Massive, powerful arms. Biceps (17 inches) like steel. Shoulders extremely broad. Hands large and strong. Grip can crush stone

lower_body.legs: Powerful legs like pillars. Thighs (26 inches) incredibly strong. Calves built for explosive movement. Stance always solid and unwavering

armor_costume.head: No helmet. Hair styled dramatically upward. Sometimes wears white headband with flame pattern

armor_costume.torso: Standard Hashira uniform with haori. White haori with flame pattern on edges. Uniform often open at chest. Colors: white, red, gold theme

armor_costume.arms: Standard sleeves rolled up. No armor. Shows off muscular arms

armor_costume.legs: Standard hakama pants. Leg wrappings. Tabi boots. Everything perfectly maintained

armor_costume.equipment: Standard Nichirin sword that turns red-orange. Standard demon-slaying kit. Always carries extra supplies for others

abilities.name: Flame Breathing
abilities.full_description: One of original five breathing styles. Nine forms focusing on powerful, straight-line attacks. Creates actual heat and flame visual effects. Techniques range from basic to ultimate forms. Can burn demons with sheer force

abilities.name: Enhanced Senses
abilities.full_description: Can sense enemy movements before they happen. Fighting spirit allows prediction of attacks. Can read opponents' techniques quickly. Never caught off guard

abilities.name: Indomitable Will
abilities.full_description: Willpower so strong it affects physical capabilities. Can fight through fatal injuries. Inspires allies with mere presence. Never gives up under any circumstances

characters.name: Tengen Uzui
title: Sound Hashira of Demon Slayer Corps
Former Shinobi Leader
Husband to Three Wives

head.eyes: Sharp, purple eyes with red pupils. Eyes glow with intensity. Can see in near darkness. Expression either fierce or dramatically flamboyant
head.nose: Strong nose with piercing. Can smell explosives and chemicals
head.ears: Exceptional hearing from shinobi training. Multiple ear piercings. Can detect heartbeats and breathing patterns
head.extra_facial_features: Extremely handsome face with dramatic makeup. White hair with red tips. Hair styled dramatically. Multiple facial piercings. Always looks flashy and eye-catching

body.chest: Massive, heavily muscled torso. Chest (48 inches) like a wall of muscle. Covered in scars and tattoos. Skin pale with dramatic markings. Physically largest Hashira
body.arms: Enormously powerful arms. Biceps (18 inches) incredibly developed. Six fingers on each hand (polydactyly). Hands can crush skulls easily

lower_body.legs: Powerful legs built for explosive movement. Thighs (28 inches) like tree trunks. Calves perfectly developed for shinobi techniques. Can move silently despite size

armor_costume.head: No helmet. White headband with gemstones. Hair styled with multiple ornaments. Dramatic eye makeup always present

armor_costume.torso: Modified uniform exposing chest. White haori with red flame pattern. Multiple belts and sashes. Carries explosives on chest. Everything flashy and dramatic

armor_costume.arms: No sleeves. Arms exposed to show muscles. Wrist guards with explosives. Multiple arm bands and jewelry

armor_costume.legs: Loose pants for movement. Multiple belts and sashes. Tabi boots for silent movement. Everything coordinated for flashiness

armor_costume.equipment: Dual Nichirin cleavers connected by chain. Multiple explosive bombs and mines. Shinobi tools and poisons. Always carries cosmetic touch-up kit

abilities.name: Sound Breathing
abilities.short_description: Personal breathing style using sound waves
abilities.full_description: Created from Thunder Breathing. Uses explosions and chain weapons. Five forms that create concussive sound waves. Can disorient and damage simultaneously. Techniques are visually and awrally spectacular

abilities.name: Musical Score
abilities.short_description: Can read enemy movements like musical notation
abilities.full_description: Unique ability developed as shinobi. Reads opponent's fighting pattern as musical score. Once complete, can predict all movements. Makes him nearly unbeatable in extended fights

abilities.name: Explosive Mastery
abilities.short_description: Expert use of explosives in combat
abilities.full_description: Carries and uses various explosives. Can time detonations perfectly. Uses explosions to enhance movements. Creates diversions and attacks simultaneously

characters.name: Mitsuri Kanroji
title: Love Hashira of Demon Slayer Corps
Strongest Female Muscle Density
Former Marriage Prospect

head.eyes: Large, expressive green eyes. Often teary or dreamy. Pupils heart-shaped when excited. Eyes show innocent enthusiasm
head.nose: Small, delicate nose. Normal sensitivity. Often wrinkles when blushing
head.ears: Normal ears hidden by long hair. Can hear compliments from far away
head.extra_facial_features: Extremely beautiful face with innocent expression. Long pink-green gradient hair in three braids. Hair reaches past knees. Always blushing. Mouth either in sweet smile or surprised O

body.chest: Extremely voluptuous figure. Chest (40 inches) unusually large for fighter. Actually has highest muscle density of any Hashira. Skin incredibly soft despite strength. Often wears revealing uniform
body.arms: Slender-looking arms with immense power. Biceps (12 inches) contain super-dense muscles. Hands delicate but grip incredibly strong. Can bend steel with fingers

lower_body.legs: Slender legs with super density. Thighs (20 inches) can kick through stone. Calves perfectly toned. Moves with unusual grace for strength

armor_costume.head: No helmet. Hair in three long braids. Green and pink ribbons. Sometimes wears hair ornaments

armor_costume.torso: Modified uniform exposing midriff. White haori with green pattern. Uniform includes chest wrap. Colors: pink, green, white theme

armor_costume.arms: No sleeves. Arms exposed. Wears arm bands. No armor needed

armor_costume.legs: Miniskirt version of hakama. Leggings underneath. Tabi boots. Everything cute and feminine

armor_costume.equipment: Unique whip-like Nichirin sword. Sword can extend and contract. Standard demon-slaying kit. Always carries love letters and sweets

abilities.name: Love Breathing
abilities.short_description: Personal breathing style derived from Flame
abilities.full_description: Created from Flame Breathing to suit her flexibility. Uses whip-sword for ranged attacks. Six forms focusing on flexibility and range. Techniques create heart and ribbon visual effects. Matches her personality perfectly

abilities.name: Super Muscle Density
abilities.short_description: Muscles eight times denser than normal
abilities.full_description: Natural physical trait. Appears slender but stronger than any Hashira physically. Can lift immense weights. Strikes have incredible force. Flexibility not reduced by density

abilities.name: Enhanced Flexibility
abilities.short_description: Can contort body in impossible ways
abilities.full_description: Joints and muscles extremely flexible. Can dodge attacks from any angle. Sword attacks come from unexpected directions. Makes her fighting style unpredictable

characters.name: Obanai Iguro
title: Serpent Hashira of Demon Slayer Corps
Master of Serpent Breathing
Mitsuri's Secret Admirer

head.eyes: Unusual heterochromatic eyes: right yellow, left green. Eyes sharp and judgmental. Rarely show emotion. Can see snake-like movement patterns
head.nose: Covered by bandages. Severely damaged from childhood torture. Can still smell but limited
head.ears: Normal ears. Can hear well. Often ignores what he doesn't want to hear
head.extra_facial_features: Face covered in bandages from mouth injuries. Black hair with uneven bangs. Hair covers right eye sometimes. Permanent stern expression. Rarely smiles

body.chest: Lean, wiry build. Chest (39 inches) shows flexibility over bulk. Covered in scars from snake pit torture. Bandages wrap entire torso. Skin pale from bandage coverage
body.arms: Long, flexible arms. Biceps (13 inches) designed for serpentine movements. Hands always gripping sword. Can twist arms unusually

lower_body.legs: Slender legs built for twisting movements. Thighs (21 inches) allow unique stances. Calves developed for sudden direction changes. Moves like snake

armor_costume.head: Bandages covering lower face. Hair covering one eye. No helmet. Kaburamaru often around neck

armor_costume.torso: Standard Hashira uniform with haori. Green and yellow striped haori. Bandages wrap entire torso. Uniform always perfectly neat

armor_costume.arms: Standard sleeves. No armor. Bandages on hands sometimes

armor_costume.legs: Standard hakama pants. Leg wrappings. Tabi boots. Everything coordinated

armor_costume.equipment: Unique curved Nichirin sword like snake fang. Kaburamaru, his pet snake partner. Standard demon-slaying kit. Always carries extra bandages

abilities.name: Serpent Breathing
abilities.full_description: Created from Water Breathing. Uses curved sword for twisting attacks. Five forms focusing on unpredictable angles. Sword moves like striking snake. Can attack from blind spots

abilities.name: Kaburamaru Partnership
abilities.full_description: White snake named Kaburamaru acts as second set of eyes. Can see behind and around corners. Warns of attacks Obanai can't see. They fight as perfect team

abilities.name: Enhanced Flexibility
abilities.short_description: Can bend and twist like snake
abilities.full_description: Body moves in serpentine patterns. Can dodge without moving feet. Attacks come from impossible angles. Makes him extremely difficult to hit

characters.name: Sanemi Shinazugawa
title: Wind Hashira of Demon Slayer Corps
Strongest Current Hashira (by statement)
Marechi Blood Carrier

head.eyes: Sharp, fierce purple eyes. Always glaring or angry. Eyes show constant pain and rage. Can see wind currents in combat
head.nose: Strong nose with scar across bridge. Can smell demons easily
head.ears: Normal ears with multiple piercings. Ignores most talking
head.extra_facial_features: Wild, scarred face. White spiky hair. Multiple scars across face. Vertical scar on forehead. Mouth either in snarl or smirk. Always looks angry

body.chest: Heavily muscled and scarred torso. Chest (45 inches) covered in scars. Self-inflicted wounds from marechi blood collection. Skin pale with many markings. Always tense
body.arms: Powerful, scarred arms. Biceps (16 inches) heavily developed. Forearms covered in cuts and scars. Hands always ready to fight

lower_body.legs: Powerful legs built for aggressive movement. Thighs (25 inches) like pistons. Calves developed for charging attacks. Always in fighting stance

armor_costume.head: No helmet. White headband sometimes. Hair wild and spiky. Always looks disheveled

armor_costume.torso: Standard Hashira uniform open at chest. Green haori with triangle pattern. Uniform often bloody or torn. Shows off scars intentionally

armor_costume.arms: No sleeves. Arms exposed to show scars. Bandages on forearms. No gloves

armor_costume.legs: Standard hakama pants. Often torn or bloody. Leg wrappings. Tabi boots

armor_costume.equipment: Standard Nichirin sword that turns green. Multiple knives for blood drawing. Demon-slaying kit. Always carries bandages for self-wounding

abilities.name: Wind Breathing
abilities.short_description: Powerful breathing style creating wind blades
abilities.full_description: One of original five breathing styles. Nine forms focusing on cutting power and range. Creates visible wind blades that extend reach. Techniques can clear wide areas. Matches his aggressive personality

abilities.name: Marechi Blood
abilities.short_description: Rare blood type that intoxicates demons
abilities.full_description: Blood so delicious it drives demons wild. Causes loss of control and focus. Uses own blood as weapon. Can draw blood mid-fight to distract demons

abilities.name: Indomitable Spirit
abilities.full_description: Can fight through any injury. Ignores pain completely. Willpower so strong it affects physical capabilities. Never retreats from fight

characters.name: Gyomei Himejima
title: Stone Hashira of Demon Slayer Corps
Strongest Demon Slayer (Current Era)
Orphanage Caretaker

head.eyes: Milky white blind eyes. Always crying. Eyes show past trauma. Despite blindness, sees more than sighted people
head.nose: Strong nose. Can smell emotions and intentions
head.ears: Exceptional hearing compensates for blindness. Can hear heartbeats and muscle movements
head.extra_facial_features: Giant, gentle face always streaked with tears. Bald head. Prayer beads around neck. Mouth either in prayer or determined line

body.chest: Massive, muscular torso like stone wall. Chest (52 inches) largest of all Hashira. Muscles like carved rock. Skin dark and heavily scarred. Bears prayer beads on chest
body.arms: Enormously powerful arms. Biceps (20 inches) like boulders. Hands massive, can crush demons head. Calloused from weapon use

lower_body.legs: Pillar-like legs. Thighs (32 inches) incredibly strong. Calves like stone columns. Stance unshakable

armor_costume.head: No hair. Prayer beads around neck. Sometimes wears simple headband. Always crying

armor_costume.torso: Simple monk robes over uniform. No haori. Robes allow free movement. Colors: brown and white theme

armor_costume.arms: Robes cover arms. No armor needed. Shows arms when fighting

armor_costume.legs: Simple pants. Leg wrappings. Sturdy sandals. Everything practical, not decorative

armor_costume.equipment: Unique flail and axe weapon. Prayer beads used as weapon too. Standard demon-slaying kit. Always carries prayer beads and religious items

abilities.name: Stone Breathing
abilities.full_description: One of original five breathing styles. Five forms focusing on immense power and defense. Creates stone-like visual effects. Weapon is flail and axe combination. Techniques are slow but unstoppable

abilities.name: Transparent World
abilities.short_description: Can see inside bodies despite blindness
abilities.full_description: Achieved through training. Can see muscles, blood flow, bone structure. Predicts movements before they happen. Makes blindness irrelevant in combat

abilities.name: Superhuman Strength
abilities.full_description: Natural physical power beyond any Hashira. Can lift and throw immense weights. Strikes can shatter stone. Defense is impenetrable

characters.name: Muichiro Tokito
title: Mist Hashira of Demon Slayer Corps
Youngest Hashira in History
Tokito Twin Survivor

head.eyes: Distant, foggy turquoise eyes. Often unfocused or daydreaming. Eyes clear during combat. Show past trauma when remembering
head.nose: Small, delicate nose. Normal sensitivity
head.ears: Normal ears hidden by hair. Often ignores sounds when spaced out
head.extra_facial_features: Androgynously beautiful face. Long black hair with turquoise tips. Hair covers most of face. Permanent distant expression. Rarely shows emotion

body.chest: Slender, youthful build. Chest (36 inches) shows surprising strength. Skin pale and unmarked. Looks fragile but isn't
body.arms: Slender arms with hidden power. Biceps (12 inches) contain prodigious strength. Hands delicate but sword grip perfect

lower_body.legs: Slender legs built for mist-like movement. Thighs (19 inches) allow quick vanishing. Calves developed for agile footwork. Moves like fog

armor_costume.head: No helmet. Long hair covers face. Sometimes wears simple headband. Looks always dreamy

armor_costume.torso: Standard Hashira uniform with haori. White cloud-patterned haori. Uniform loose-fitting. Colors: white and blue theme

armor_costume.arms: Loose sleeves. No armor. Hands often in pockets

armor_costume.legs: Loose hakama pants. Leg wrappings. Tabi boots. Everything seems too big for him

armor_costume.equipment: Standard Nichirin sword that turns pale blue. Standard demon-slaying kit. Often forgets where he put things

abilities.name: Mist Breathing
abilities.full_description: Derived from Wind Breathing. Seven forms focusing on obscuring movement. Creates mist that hides user. Techniques are swift and precise. Matches his elusive personality

abilities.name: Prodigy Talent
abilities.full_description: Became Hashira in two months. Learns techniques instantly. Can create new forms spontaneously. Natural talent beyond hard work

abilities.name: Mark of the Demon Slayer
abilities.full_description: Mark appears on cheek when activated. Dramatically increases all abilities. Allows access to Transparent World. Shortens lifespan but grants immense power

characters.name: Kokushibo
title: Upper Rank One of Twelve Kizuki
Former Demon Slayer
Moon Breathing Creator
Centuries-Old Demon

head.eyes: Six demon eyes with yellow irises and red pupils. Three pairs vertically aligned. Eyes show centuries of experience. Can see all directions simultaneously
head.nose: Normal demon nose. Can smell blood and fear
head.ears: Normal ears. Can hear centuries of battles
head.extra_facial_features: Pale demon skin with dark red markings. Long black hair with red tips. Hair styled in ponytail. Face shows nobility and age. Permanent serious expression. Horns on forehead

body.chest: Tall, muscular torso. Chest (50 inches) shows centuries of power. Skin pale with demon markings. Multiple arms when using full power. Always imposing
body.arms: Multiple arms in battle form. Biceps (16 inches each) contain immense power. Hands grip unique sword. Can grow additional arms as needed

lower_body.legs: Powerful legs built for stability. Thighs (30 inches) like pillars. Calves developed for centuries of combat. Stance unshakable

armor_costume.head: No helmet. Hair in high ponytail. Horns visible. Six eyes always watching

armor_costume.torso: Simple dark kimono. No armor needed. Kimono opens to show chest. Colors: dark purple and black

armor_costume.arms: Kimono sleeves. Arms exposed when fighting. Shows multiple arms in combat

armor_costume.legs: Traditional hakama pants. No leg armor. Simple sandals

armor_costume.equipment: Unique flesh sword that grows from body. Sword can extend and contract. No other equipment needed

abilities.name: Moon Breathing
abilities.full_description: Created from Sun Breathing. Sixteen forms with countless variations. Creates crescent moon blades that extend endlessly. Techniques can cover entire areas. Most complex breathing style in existence

abilities.name: Centuries of Experience
abilities.full_description: Has fought countless demon slayers. Knows all breathing styles and counters. Cannot be surprised by any technique. Adapts instantly to opponents

abilities.name: Demon Art: Blade Manifestation
abilities.full_description: Grows katana from flesh that can extend. Blade has flesh-eye that sees everything. Can create multiple blades simultaneously. Blades regenerate instantly if broken

characters.name: Doma
title: Upper Rank Two of Twelve Kizuki
Paradise Faith Cult Leader
Shinobu's Nemesis

head.eyes: Rainbow-colored eyes with kanji for Upper Two. Eyes show no emotion. Always smiling blankly. Can see spiritual energy
head.nose: Normal nose. Can smell emotions and spiritual states
head.ears: Normal ears. Ignores most sounds
head.extra_facial_features: Beautiful, androgynous face with permanent empty smile. White hair with colorful tips. Hair styled elegantly. Skin pale and perfect. Looks like angel but is demon

body.chest: Slender, elegant build. Chest (38 inches) shows no muscle definition. Appears fragile but isn't. Skin pale and unmarked
body.arms: Slender arms with hidden power. Biceps (12 inches) contain demonic strength. Hands delicate but deadly

lower_body.legs: Slender legs built for graceful movement. Thighs (20 inches) allow elegant footwork. Calves perfectly formed. Moves like dancer

armor_costume.head: No helmet. Hair styled with decorations. Sometimes wears cult leader headpiece. Always smiling

armor_costume.torso: Extravagant cult leader robes. Multiple layers of fine silk. Colors: white with rainbow accents. Looks more like noble than demon

armor_costume.arms: Long flowing sleeves. No armor. Hands often folded in prayer

armor_costume.legs: Elaborate pants under robes. No leg armor. Elegant shoes

armor_costume.equipment: Unique pair of sharp fans. Can create ice with fans. No other weapons needed. Always carries cult symbols

abilities.name: Ice Blood Demon Art
abilities.full_description: Can freeze anything instantly. Creates ice sculptures and weapons. Freezes blood in victims' veins. Ice is unmelting without his will

abilities.name: Emotion Absorption
abilities.full_description: Prefers to consume emotions rather than bodies. Can sense and taste emotions. Gains power from strong feelings. Particularly enjoys despair and devotion

abilities.name: Cryokinesis
abilities.short_description: Complete control over ice and cold
abilities.full_description: Can lower temperature to absolute zero. Creates ice clones of himself. Freezes space around him. Can survive complete freezing

characters.name: Akaza
title: Upper Rank Three of Twelve Kizuki
Master Martial Artist
Compulsive Fighter

head.eyes: Yellow eyes with blue pupils and Upper Three kanji. Eyes burn with fighting spirit. Always looking for strong opponents
head.nose: Normal nose. Can smell fighting spirit
head.ears: Normal ears. Can hear heartbeats in combat
head.extra_facial_features: Handsome face with wild pink hair. Blue demon markings on face. Hair spiky and untamed. Permanent fierce grin. Blue lips from demon nature

body.chest: Muscular, defined torso. Chest (44 inches) shows martial artist build. Blue compass pattern on chest. Skin pale with blue markings
body.arms: Powerful arms built for striking. Biceps (15 inches) perfectly developed. Hands always in fighting stance. Can deliver devastating blows

lower_body.legs: Strong legs built for kicking. Thighs (24 inches) allow powerful kicks. Calves developed for agile footwork. Always in fighting stance

armor_costume.head: No helmet. Hair wild and spiky. Blue markings on face. Always looks ready to fight

armor_costume.torso: Simple black pants only. No shirt. Shows compass pattern on chest. No armor needed

armor_costume.arms: No sleeves. Arms exposed. Wrist bands sometimes. Shows off muscles

armor_costume.legs: Simple black pants. No leg armor. Barefoot for better footing

armor_costume.equipment: No weapons. Fights with fists only. Sometimes wears wrist bands. No other equipment

abilities.name: Destructive Death: Compass Needle
abilities.full_description: Created from human martial arts. Uses demonic power to enhance strikes. Can create shockwaves with punches. Techniques have names like Air Type, Annihilation Type

abilities.name: Battle Spirit Detection
abilities.short_description: Can see fighting spirit as compass
abilities.full_description: Sees opponent's fighting spirit as bright light. Compass on chest points to weaknesses. Can predict attacks through spirit reading. Makes him nearly impossible to surprise

abilities.name: Instant Regeneration
abilities.full_description: Can regenerate head and heart destruction. Only sunlight or beheading can kill. Regeneration is near-instantaneous. Can fight while regenerating

characters.name: Hantengu
title: Upper Rank Four of Twelve Kizuki
Master of Emotion Clones
Original Body Hider

head.eyes: Multiple eye styles across clones. Main body has fearful, teary eyes. Can see through all clones simultaneously
head.nose: Multiple noses across clones. Main body has runny nose from crying
head.ears: Multiple ears across clones. Can hear through all clones
head.extra_facial_features: Main body: old, fearful man face. Clones have different emotions: anger, joy, sorrow, pleasure. Each clone has unique appearance. All share green color scheme

body.chest: Main body: shriveled, weak torso. Clones: varied builds from muscular to slender. Each clone has different physical attributes
body.arms: Main body: weak arms. Clones: powerful arms with different weapons. Each clone specializes in different attacks

lower_body.legs: Main body: weak legs. Clones: strong legs for different movement styles. Some fly, some run, some crawl

armor_costume.head: Main body: no helmet, looks pathetic. Clones: various head styles matching emotions

armor_costume.torso: Main body: simple robe. Clones: varied costumes matching emotions. Anger has minimal covering, others have robes

armor_costume.arms: Main body: no armor. Clones: various armaments. Anger has axes, others have different weapons

armor_costume.legs: Main body: simple pants. Clones: varied leg coverings. Some have armor, some have none

armor_costume.equipment: Multiple weapons across clones. Main body has no equipment. Each clone has specialized weapon

abilities.name: Emotion Clone Creation
abilities.full_description: Creates four main clones: Anger, Pleasure, Sorrow, Joy. Each has unique abilities and weapons. Clones can merge into stronger forms. Main body hides separately for survival

abilities.name: Clone Fusion: Zohakuten
abilities.short_description: Fuses clones into powerful dragon form
abilities.full_description: Clones merge into wood dragon user. Controls multiple wooden dragons simultaneously. Dragons have different elemental attacks. Most powerful form besides final transformation

abilities.name: Body Separation Survival
abilities.short_description: Main body can hide while clones fight
abilities.full_description: True body is small and hides. Clones can be destroyed without killing main body. Must destroy main body to win. Main body is cowardly and runs away

characters.name: Gyokko
title: Upper Rank Five of Twelve Kizuki
Self-Proclaimed Greatest Artist
Master of Pot Transportation

head.eyes: Multiple small eyes on fish-like face. Eyes see artistic potential in everything. No pupils, just blank white eyes
head.nose: No human nose. Fish-like face with gills
head.ears: No human ears. Hears through vibration sensing
head.extra_facial_features: Grotesque fish-pot hybrid face. Mouth full of sharp teeth. Skin like pottery glaze. Multiple arms from pots. Looks like living artwork gone wrong

body.chest: Pot-like torso that can open. Chest contains smaller pots. Skin ceramic-like and hard. Can store things in body pots
body.arms: Multiple arms growing from pots. Biceps vary in size. Hands can morph into tools. Each arm has different function

lower_body.legs: Fish-tail lower body or pot legs. Can change form as needed. Not built for running but for pot movement

armor_costume.head: No helmet. Head is pot-like. Sometimes wears decorative items. Always looks grotesque

armor_costume.torso: Pot-like body. No clothing needed. Decorated with artistic patterns. Colors: ceramic whites and blues

armor_costume.arms: Multiple arms from pots. No armor. Each arm has different decoration

armor_costume.legs: Pot or fish tail lower body. No leg armor. Moves by pot teleportation mostly

armor_costume.equipment: Multiple pots for transportation and attack. Can create weapons from pots. Carries art supplies. Always has masterpiece pots ready

abilities.name: Pot Transportation
abilities.full_description: Can move instantly between connected pots. Can trap enemies in pots. Pots are unbreakable from inside. Creates complex pot networks for movement

abilities.name: Living Art Creation
abilities.full_description: Transforms victims into fish or pottery. Artistic transformations are permanent. Creates monstrous art creatures to fight for him. Considers this 'beautification'

abilities.name: Thousand-Dragon Fish
abilities.full_description: Transforms into massive fish-dragon form. Creates thousands of deadly fish. Fish can regenerate endlessly. Most powerful attack form

characters.name: Daki and Gyutaro
title: Upper Rank Six of Twelve Kizuki
Entertainment District Rulers
Sibling Demon Pair

head.eyes: Daki: beautiful purple eyes with kanji. Gyutaro: fierce yellow eyes with kanji. Both can see through each other's eyes
head.nose: Daki: delicate nose. Gyutaro: broken nose from human life
head.ears: Both have normal hearing. Can communicate telepathically
head.extra_facial_features: Daki: incredibly beautiful oiran face. Gyutaro: grotesque, skeletal face. Daki looks human, Gyutaro looks monstrous. Share body connection

body.chest: Daki: beautiful female form. Gyutaro: emaciated male form. Share life force despite separate bodies
body.arms: Daki: delicate arms with obi control. Gyutaro: bony arms with sickles. Both have demonic strength

lower_body.legs: Daki: elegant legs. Gyutaro: thin legs. Both can move independently but share existence

armor_costume.head: Daki: elaborate oiran hairstyle. Gyutaro: wild green hair. Both have Upper Six kanji in eyes

armor_costume.torso: Daki: extravagant kimono. Gyutaro: simple loincloth. Daki carries Gyutaro in her back

armor_costume.arms: Daki: kimono sleeves. Gyutaro: exposed bony arms. Both have their weapons

armor_costume.legs: Daki: kimono skirt. Gyutaro: exposed legs. Daki wears geta, Gyutaro barefoot

armor_costume.equipment: Daki: obi sashes as weapons. Gyutaro: twin blood sickles. Share demonic power pool

abilities.name: Obi Sash Control (Daki)
abilities.full_description: Can extend obi sashes to incredible lengths. Sashes can cut through buildings. Can control multiple sashes simultaneously. Sashes regenerate if cut

abilities.name: Blood Demon Art: Blood Sickles (Gyutaro)
abilities.full_description: Creates twin sickles from own blood. Sickles can fly and be controlled remotely. Blood contains deadly poison. Can create blood explosions

abilities.name: Shared Existence
abilities.full_description: They share life force and regeneration. If one survives, can regenerate the other. Must decapitate both at same time with same blade. Most difficult Upper Moon to kill

characters.name: Enmu
title: Lower Rank One of Twelve Kizuki
Mugen Train Controller
Dream Invasion Specialist

head.eyes: Multiple eyes on hands and face. Main eyes are gentle-looking but deceptive. Eyes can see into dreams
head.nose: Normal nose. Can smell sleep states
head.ears: Normal ears. Can hear dream conversations
head.extra_facial_features: Androgynous, gentle-looking face. Pale skin with black markings. Smiles constantly but insincerely. Mouth has vertical slit

body.chest: Slender, non-threatening build. Chest (36 inches) appears weak. Actually quite durable. Skin pale with dream-related markings
body.arms: Slender arms with eye-palms. Biceps (11 inches) contain dream power. Hands have mouths and eyes. Can extend arms into tentacles

lower_body.legs: Slender legs built for train movement. Thighs (19 inches) allow quick escapes. Can merge with train structure

armor_costume.head: No helmet. Hair neatly styled. Looks harmless intentionally

armor_costume.torso: Simple dark kimono. Looks like train conductor. Colors: dark blues and blacks

armor_costume.arms: Kimono sleeves. Arms exposed when using powers. Shows eye-palms

armor_costume.legs: Simple pants. No leg armor. Wears simple shoes

armor_costume.equipment: No conventional weapons. Uses dream manipulation. Carries sleep-inducing items. Controls train through demon art

abilities.name: Dream Manipulation
abilities.full_description: Can enter anyone's dreams. Creates pleasant dreams to lower guard. Places dream spell marks to destroy spiritual cores. If victim dies in dream, dies in reality

abilities.name: Train Fusion
abilities.full_description: Fuses body with Mugen Train structure. Can control all train functions. Train becomes extension of his body. Can create train monster forms

abilities.name: Flesh Manipulation
abilities.full_description: Can extend arms into tentacles. Create additional eyes and mouths. Body is highly malleable. Can split into multiple bodies

characters.name: Rui
title: Lower Rank Five of Twelve Kizuki
Spider Family Leader
Mt. Natagumo Controller

head.eyes: Large, childlike eyes with Lower Five kanji. Eyes show loneliness and longing. Can see spiritual threads connecting beings
head.nose: Small, childlike nose. Normal sensitivity
head.ears: Normal ears. Can hear spider web vibrations
head.extra_facial_features: Childlike face that belies cruelty. Pale skin with red markings. Hair white with black tips. Looks like innocent child but is deadly

body.chest: Child-sized torso. Chest (30 inches) appears weak. Actually contains demonic power. Skin pale with spider web patterns
body.arms: Slender child arms. Biceps (9 inches) can create strong threads. Hands can produce spider silk

lower_body.legs: Child-sized legs. Thighs (15 inches) allow quick movement. Can walk on own threads

armor_costume.head: No helmet. Hair neatly cut. Looks like human child

armor_costume.torso: Simple white kimono. Looks like mourning clothes. Colors: white and red accents

armor_costume.arms: Kimono sleeves. Arms exposed when using threads
armor_costume.legs: Simple hakama pants. No leg armor. Barefoot usually

armor_costume.equipment: No conventional weapons. Uses spider threads. Controls spider family. Lives in web-covered mountain

abilities.name: Thread Manipulation
abilities.full_description: Can produce threads sharp enough to cut stone. Creates complex web structures. Threads can be controlled remotely. Can sense everything touching threads

abilities.name: Demon Family Creation
abilities.full_description: Forces demons to play family roles. Kills those who disobey family rules. Seeks perfect family to replace human one. Extremely possessive of 'family' members

abilities.name: Web Domain
abilities.full_description: Covers entire mountain in spider webs. Web acts as sensor network. Can attack anyone in territory. Territory is deadly trap for intruders

head.eyes: Sharp, predatory red eyes with slit pupils. Eyes show no humanity or emotion. Can see in complete darkness. Eyes change color when angry
head.nose: Perfect aristocratic nose. Can smell fear and blood from miles away
head.ears: Perfect hearing. Can hear whispers across cities
head.extra_facial_features: Perfectly handsome face that can change appearance. Black hair styled elegantly. Skin pale and flawless. Can appear as man, woman, or child. True form is monstrous

body.chest: Perfect human form when disguised. True form has multiple mouths and eyes. Can shapeshift any body part. Skin can harden to diamond density
body.arms: Can grow multiple arms. Arms can extend into whips or blades. Each finger can become weapon. Can create weapons from own flesh

lower_body.legs: Can grow multiple legs. Legs can become tentacles. Can move at incredible speeds. Can transform lower body entirely

armor_costume.head: No helmet. Hair perfectly styled. Wears elegant hats when in disguise

armor_costume.torso: Elegant suits or kimonos when disguised. True form has no clothing. Prefers expensive, fine clothing

armor_costume.arms: No armor. Arms exposed or covered by sleeves. Shows perfection in human form

armor_costume.legs: Fine pants or kimono skirts. Wears expensive shoes. Everything of highest quality

armor_costume.equipment: No weapons needed. Own body is ultimate weapon. Sometimes carries walking cane. Always has demon servants nearby

abilities.name: Complete Shapeshifting
abilities.full_description: Can change age, gender, appearance at will. Can split into multiple bodies. Can transform body parts into weapons. Only sunlight can reveal true form

abilities.name: Biokinesis
abilities.full_description: Can control every cell in body. Can create demons from own blood. Can modify own biology instantly. Can heal any injury except sunlight

abilities.name: Demon Creation and Control
abilities.full_description: All demons are connected to him. Can kill any demon remotely. Can see through demons' eyes. Can communicate telepathically with demons

abilities.name: Multiple Lives
abilities.full_description: Seven hearts and five brains in true form. Must destroy all simultaneously to kill. Each organ can function independently. Most difficult being to kill in existence

head.eyes: Cloudy, blind eyes that still see deeply. Eyes show wisdom and pain. Despite blindness, sees people's hearts
head.nose: Delicate nose. Can smell sincerity and intentions
head.ears: Exceptional hearing. Listens to all Corps members equally
head.extra_facial_features: Beautiful, ethereal face marred by curse. Skin pale and translucent. Purple curse markings across face. Always gentle smile despite pain. Looks fragile but spirit is strong

body.chest: Frail, weakened body. Chest (34 inches) shows illness. Body deteriorating from curse. Skin covered in curse markings. Cannot stand or move without help
body.arms: Thin, weak arms. Biceps (10 inches) show no strength. Hands delicate but often folded in prayer. Cannot hold weapons

lower_body.legs: Atrophied legs from lack of use. Thighs (16 inches) weak. Cannot walk. Always seated or carried

armor_costume.head: No helmet. Hair neatly styled. Often has flower in hair. Looks serene despite pain

armor_costume.torso: Elegant white kimono. Kimono shows status but not armor. Colors: white and purple theme

armor_costume.arms: Kimono sleeves. No armor. Hands often covered by sleeves

armor_costume.legs: Kimono covers legs. No leg armor. Never wears shoes indoors

armor_costume.equipment: No weapons. Carries communication bells. Has family heirlooms. Always has medical supplies nearby

abilities.name: Charismatic Leadership
abilities.full_description: Can command Hashira with mere words. Inspires devotion in all Corps members. Can calm angry hearts with presence. Leadership holds Corps together for centuries

abilities.name: Strategic Genius
abilities.full_description: Plans centuries ahead against Muzan. Coordinates all Corps operations perfectly. Anticipates demon movements. Sets final plan in motion despite own death

abilities.name: Curse Resistance
abilities.full_description: All male Ubuyashiki die young from curse. Bears curse so others might live. Uses curse to track Muzan. Sacrifice is key to final battle

head.eyes: Kind, gentle eyes that show strength. Eyes see everything in household. Always watching over family and Corps
head.nose: Delicate nose. Can smell trouble before it happens
head.ears: Good hearing. Listens to all family matters
head.extra_facial_features: Beautiful, mature face. Hair styled traditionally. Always calm expression. Shows both gentleness and iron will

body.chest: Slender motherly frame. Chest (35 inches) shows woman who has borne children. Always perfect posture
body.arms: Slender arms with hidden strength. Biceps (11 inches) from caring work. Hands always busy helping

lower_body.legs: Slender legs built for constant movement. Thighs (20 inches) allow quick household management. Always on feet caring for others

armor_costume.head: No helmet. Hair in traditional married woman style. Always neat and proper

armor_costume.torso: Elegant kimono suitable for leadership wife. Colors subdued but elegant. Always perfectly dressed

armor_costume.arms: Kimono sleeves. No armor. Hands often busy with tasks

armor_costume.legs: Kimono skirt. No leg armor. Wears traditional footwear

armor_costume.equipment: No weapons. Carries household keys. Always has medical supplies. Manages entire estate

abilities.name: Estate Management
abilities.full_description: Runs massive estate seamlessly. Coordinates all domestic operations. Manages staff of hundreds. Keeps everything running despite crisis

abilities.name: Family Care
abilities.full_description: Supports dying husband emotionally. Raises five children alone. Maintains family traditions. Prepares children for leadership

abilities.name: Ceremonial Leadership
abilities.full_description: Conducts important Corps rituals. Maintains centuries of tradition. Ensures continuity of leadership. Represents Corps in formal matters

head.eyes: Young but wise eyes. Eyes show burden of leadership. Already see more than most adults
head.nose: Small child nose. Normal sensitivity
head.ears: Good hearing. Listens to advisors carefully
head.extra_facial_features: Young boy face that is serious beyond years. Hair neatly cut. Wears father's mantle. Expression always serious and focused

body.chest: Small child frame. Chest (28 inches) shows youth. Already bears curse markings. Skin pale like father
body.arms: Small child arms. Biceps (8 inches) no strength. Hands often holding leadership items

lower_body.legs: Small child legs. Thighs (14 inches) young. Already learning to lead despite age

armor_costume.head: No helmet. Hair neat. Wears simple headband sometimes

armor_costume.torso: Miniature version of father's kimono. Colors: white and purple. Wears leadership mantle

armor_costume.arms: Kimono sleeves. No armor. Hands often holding something important

armor_costume.legs: Kimono covers legs. No leg armor. Wears small sandals

armor_costume.equipment: Father's bells and communication devices. Leadership seals and documents. Always has advisors nearby

abilities.name: Inherited Leadership
abilities.full_description: Trained since birth to lead Corps. Knows all Corps secrets and operations. Can command Hashira despite age. Continues father's final plan

abilities.name: Twin Coordination
abilities.full_description: Coordinates with sister Kanata seamlessly. They share leadership duties. Can communicate without words. Perfect teamwork in crisis

abilities.name: Curse Management
abilities.short_description: Manages family curse for new era
abilities.full_description: Bears curse but plans to end it. Uses curse connection strategically. Final leader if plan succeeds. Breaks curse cycle

head.eyes: Large, beautiful purple eyes. Once empty, now showing emotion. Eyes see everything in detail. Can analyze movements perfectly
head.nose: Small, delicate nose. Normal sensitivity
head.ears: Good hearing. Listens carefully when spoken to
head.extra_facial_features: Beautiful, doll-like face. Purple eyes and hair. Hair in side ponytail with butterfly hairpin. Often blank expression learning to show feelings

body.chest: Slender, athletic build. Chest (33 inches) shows training. Skin pale but healthy
body.arms: Slender arms with precise strength. Biceps (11 inches) perfect for Flower Breathing. Hands delicate but sword grip perfect

lower_body.legs: Slender legs built for graceful movement. Thighs (19 inches) allow flower-like footwork. Calves perfectly toned

armor_costume.head: Butterfly hairpin like Shinobu's. Hair in side ponytail. No helmet

armor_costume.torso: Standard uniform with butterfly haori. Haori is gift from Shinobu. Colors: purple and white theme

armor_costume.arms: Standard sleeves. No armor. Hands often hold coin

armor_costume.legs: Standard hakama pants. Leg wrappings. Tabi boots

armor_costume.equipment: Standard Nichirin sword that turns pale pink. Special coin for decision making. Standard demon-slaying kit. Butterfly message system

abilities.name: Flower Breathing
abilities.short_description: Graceful breathing style focusing on precision
abilities.full_description: Mastered all Flower Breathing forms. Techniques create flower petal visual effects. Focuses on precise, vital strikes. Can combine with insect breathing techniques

abilities.name: Total Concentration: Constant
abilities.full_description: Can maintain enhanced state 24/7. All physical abilities maximized constantly. Rare ability among slayers. Trained by Shinobu specifically

abilities.name: Enhanced Vision
abilities.short_description: Can see minute details and movements
abilities.full_description: Trained to see everything in combat. Can analyze opponent's techniques instantly. Sees openings others miss. Vision is key to her fighting style

head.eyes: Sharp, fierce eyes like brother's. Eyes show determination and pain. Can see demonic energy after eating demons
head.nose: Strong nose. Can smell demon flesh he needs
head.ears: Normal ears. Ignores brother's harsh words
head.extra_facial_features: Wild, angry face similar to Sanemi. White hair spiky. Multiple scars on face. Permanent scowl or determined expression

body.chest: Muscular, defined torso. Chest (42 inches) shows strength. Skin bears demonic markings when powered up
body.arms: Powerful arms for gun use. Biceps (14 inches) from training. Hands calloused from weapons

lower_body.legs: Strong legs built for positioning. Thighs (23 inches) allow quick repositioning. Calves developed for gunner stance

armor_costume.head: No helmet. Hair wild like brother's. Often has bandage on face

armor_costume.torso: Standard uniform open at chest. Shows scars like brother. No haori. Looks rough and ready

armor_costume.arms: No sleeves. Arms exposed. Bandages on arms sometimes

armor_costume.legs: Standard pants. Leg wrappings. Sturdy boots

armor_costume.equipment: Double-barreled shotgun for close combat. Nichirin sword for emergencies. Demon flesh for power ups. Standard demon-slaying kit

abilities.name: Demon Consumption
abilities.full_description: Can temporarily gain demon abilities by eating them. Gains regeneration, strength, unique powers. Effect is temporary. Must consume demon flesh to activate

abilities.name: Firearm Mastery
abilities.short_description: Expert use of specially designed guns
abilities.full_description: Uses guns with nichirin bullets. Can damage demons at range. Skilled in close-quarters gun combat. Modified guns for demon slaying

abilities.name: Partial Demon Transformation
abilities.full_description: Grows fangs and claws when using power. Skin becomes demon-like. Gains enhanced senses and regeneration. Maintains human consciousness

head.eyes: Normal, determined eyes. Eyes show experience and caution. Not exceptional but reliable
head.nose: Normal nose. Average sensitivity
head.ears: Normal ears. Good hearing but not exceptional
head.extra_facial_features: Average, friendly face. Brown hair in simple style. Looks like everyman. Expression usually serious but kind

body.chest: Average athletic build. Chest (38 inches) shows training. Skin has some scars from battles
body.arms: Average arms for swordsman. Biceps (13 inches) decent. Hands calloused from training

lower_body.legs: Average legs built for standard movement. Thighs (21 inches) adequate. Calves normally developed

armor_costume.head: No helmet. Hair neat. Sometimes wears headband

armor_costume.torso: Standard uniform. No haori. Uniform well-maintained

armor_costume.arms: Standard sleeves. No armor. Normal gloves

armor_costume.legs: Standard hakama pants. Leg wrappings. Tabi boots

armor_costume.equipment: Standard Nichirin sword. Standard demon-slaying kit. Nothing special but reliable

abilities.name: Water Breathing (Basic)
abilities.full_description: Knows basic Water Breathing forms. Not master level but competent. Can handle lower rank demons. Reliable in group combat

abilities.name: Survival Instinct
abilities.full_description: Survived multiple deadly encounters. Knows when to retreat and regroup. Good at assessing danger levels. Reliable comrade in dangerous situations

abilities.name: Team Coordination
abilities.full_description: Coordinates well with other slayers. Good at following orders. Can lead small groups when needed. Reliable support in battles

head.eyes: Piercing, focused eyes with flame-like pupils. Eyes can see Transparent World naturally. See everything including life force
head.nose: Strong nose. Can smell demonic presence miles away
head.ears: Exceptional hearing. Can hear heartbeats and muscle movements
head.extra_facial_features: Serious, focused face. Red hair and markings like flame. Hanafuda earrings like Tanjiro's. Expression shows absolute focus

body.chest: Perfect swordsman physique. Chest (43 inches) shows peak human form. Skin bears sun-like markings. Perfect balance and posture
body.arms: Perfect arms for swordsmanship. Biceps (15 inches) perfectly developed. Hands grip sword with absolute control

lower_body.legs: Perfect legs for movement. Thighs (24 inches) allow instant acceleration. Calves developed for perfect footwork

armor_costume.head: No helmet. Hair neat. Hanafuda earrings always worn

armor_costume.torso: Simple demon slayer garb. No elaborate armor. Colors: red and black theme

armor_costume.arms: Simple sleeves. No armor. Arms free for movement

armor_costume.legs: Simple pants. Leg wrappings. Simple footwear

armor_costume.equipment: Standard Nichirin sword that turns bright red. No other equipment needed. Sword is extension of self

abilities.name: Sun Breathing (Original)
abilities.short_description: Original and most powerful breathing style
abilities.full_description: Created all other breathing styles. Thirteen forms that mimic sun. Creates actual solar heat and light. Can burn demons like actual sunlight. Perfected beyond any other style

abilities.name: Transparent World (Natural)
abilities.short_description: Born able to see Transparent World
abilities.full_description: Can see muscles, blood flow, bone structure naturally. Can predict all movements before they happen. Sees life force and weaknesses. Born with this ability, not trained

abilities.name: Selfless State
abilities.short_description: Cannot be detected by battle spirit
abilities.full_description: Eliminates all fighting spirit and killing intent. Cannot be sensed or predicted. Makes him invisible to demon senses. Ultimate stealth state

abilities.name: Perfect Control
abilities.full_description: Every movement is perfect and efficient. No wasted motion or energy. Can fight for days without tiring. Physical perfection achieved

head.eyes: Kind, intelligent purple eyes. Eyes show centuries of wisdom and compassion. Can see microscopic details for medicine
head.nose: Delicate nose. Can smell diseases and poisons
head.ears: Good hearing. Listens carefully to patients
head.extra_facial_features: Beautiful, mature face. Purple hair styled elegantly. Looks like refined noblewoman. Expression always kind and intelligent

body.chest: Slender, graceful build. Chest (34 inches) shows no combat training. Skin pale but healthy for demon
body.arms: Slender arms for medical work. Biceps (10 inches) delicate. Hands skilled for surgery and medicine

lower_body.legs: Slender legs built for clinic movement. Thighs (19 inches) allow quick movement in lab. Graceful movements

armor_costume.head: No helmet. Hair elegantly styled. Often wears hair ornaments

armor_costume.torso: Elegant kimono suitable for doctor. Colors: purple and white theme. Always looks professional

armor_costume.arms: Kimono sleeves. No armor. Hands often gloved for medical work

armor_costume.legs: Kimono skirt. No leg armor. Wears traditional footwear

armor_costume.equipment: Medical equipment and supplies. Research notes and formulas. Medicine for demon cure. Protection charms from Yushiro

abilities.name: Medical Genius
abilities.full_description: Has studied medicine for 400+ years. Understands demon biology completely. Created medicines that affect demons. Developing cure for demon transformation

abilities.name: Blood Demon Art: Organic Manipulation
abilities.full_description: Can analyze and manipulate biological material. Creates medicines from own blood. Can temporarily paralyze demons. Uses art for healing, not combat

abilities.name: Muzan's Curse Resistance
abilities.full_description: First demon to break free from Muzan. Developed method to resist control. Can hide from Muzan's detection. Teaches others to resist

head.eyes: Sharp, focused eyes. Eyes show devotion to Tamayo. Can see through own illusions
head.nose: Normal nose. Can smell threats to Tamayo
head.ears: Good hearing. Listens for danger constantly
head.extra_facial_features: Young, serious face. Black hair with purple tips. Often scowling, especially at intruders. Only smiles around Tamayo

body.chest: Slender, athletic build. Chest (36 inches) shows some training. Skin pale like demon
body.arms: Slender arms with some strength. Biceps (12 inches) from protection duties. Hands often making medicine or fighting

lower_body.legs: Slender legs built for quick movement. Thighs (20 inches) allow rapid protection responses. Agile movements

armor_costume.head: No helmet. Hair neat. Often looks annoyed

armor_costume.torso: Simple dark kimono. Practical for work. Colors: black and purple theme

armor_costume.arms: Kimono sleeves rolled up for work. No armor

armor_costume.legs: Simple pants. No leg armor. Practical footwear

armor_costume.equipment: Medicine-making tools. Illusion talismans. Protection devices for Tamayo. Basic combat tools

abilities.name: Blood Demon Art: Illusion Creation
abilities.full_description: Can create illusions that hide people and places. Illusions are perfect and undetectable. Can make entire building disappear. Uses talismans to activate illusions

abilities.name: Enhanced Agility
abilities.full_description: Moves faster than eye can follow. Can dodge most attacks easily. Agile enough to protect Tamayo from any threat. Speed is primary defense

abilities.name: Medicine Assistance
abilities.full_description: Helps Tamayo with all medical research. Can prepare complex medicines. Understands demon biology well. Essential to cure development
